text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali chaired a cabinet meeting that discussed the situation in the tourism sector. Results this season are seen satisfactory.
- John Koo, Chairman of South-Korean firm LGF Electronics praised President Ben Ali efforts on Tunisia's economic development.

- Tunisian ambassadors abroad and businessmen met to discuss how to promote Tunisia's exports and attract more investors. The meeting was chaired by Foreign Affairs Minister Abderrahim Zouari and the chairman of Tunisian bosses Hedi Jilani.
- Airline Tunis Air passenger traffic rose by 22.04 percent in July this year compared to the same month last year.
